LOOTABLE.rndltHUDHint: Roll Random Loot for this token
LOOTABLE.reloadHint: Some of the changed settings require a reload of the application to take effect. Would you like to reload now?

rndltPrompt.name: Random Loot Roll
rndltPrompt.noResults: No results yet. Click New Roll to generate loot.

tsrplIntf.name: Treasure Pile Generator
tsrplIntf.autogenInfo: Auto Generate will attempt to match the Min value as closely as possible without going over the Max value. Only tables configured in the Default Tables in the settings will be rolled on.
tsrplIntf.drop: drag items here to add to results...

notice.noTables: No rollable tables found in your world.

pktcgSettings.name: Pocket Change Settings
pktcgSettings.minCoinAmtHint: Minimum number of coins a token can receive in cp if not 0. [default: 10]
pktcgSettings.ignoreExistCoinHint: Tokens that already have coin are ignored. [default: true]
pktcgSettings.allowedTypesHint: List of creature types that can receive coin, types are separated by commas. (e.g., humanoid, beast, monstrosity) [default: humanoid]
pktcgSettings.ProbabilityNote: The total values of the probabilities should not exceed 100% otherwise it will fail to correctly calculate.
pktcgSettings.noCoinChanceHint: Probability of a token receiving no coin. (0-100%) [default: 0%]
pktcgSettings.tenPerChanceHint: Probability of a token receiving one tenth the amount of coin. (0-100%) [default: 5%]
pktcgSettings.halfChanceHint: Probability of a token receiving half the amount of coin. (0-100%) [default: 10%]
pktcgSettings.doubleChanceHint: Probability of a token receiving double the amount of coin. (0-100%) [default: 10%]
pktcgSettings.tripleChanceHint: Probability of a token receiving triple the amount of coin. (0-100%) [default: 5%]
pktcgSettings.hidePktcgChatMsgHint: Hide chat messages when coin is generated. [default: false]

rndltSettings.name: Random Loot Settings
rndltSettings.modeHint: Determines when random loot is added to tokens. [default: On Token Creation]
rndltSettings.usePromptHint: When enabled, shows a prompt to roll for loot instead of automatically rolling. [default: false]
rndltSettings.hideHUDHint: Hide the random loot button from the token HUD. [default: false]
rndltSettings.rolltableTypesInfo: Tokens added to the scene will use the first matching rolltable in the list below.
rndltSettings.hideMsgHint: Hide chat messages when items are granted. [default: false]

tableSelector.name: Select Table
tableSelector.noTables: No rollable tables found in your world.

error.invalidCRRange: Minimum CR cannot be greater than Maximum CR.
error.requiredField: CR value must be filled out.
error.maxValueError: Value must be less than or equal to 30.
error.duplicateEntry: A creature type with these exact specifications already exists.

tsrplSettings.name: Treasure Pile Settings
tsrplSettings.genLimitHint: The maximum number of times the treasure pile will be generated. [default: 50]
tsrplSettings.showAllHint: When enabled, shows all available tables in the Treasure Pile interface regardless of the default table selection.
